trans-unit.source: A list of dependencies will need to be installed in order to use the application (all of these can be installed using pip). These can be found here, and installed using this command: pip install -r requirements.txt. In order to then run the tool, use python main.py.
trans-unit.target: 为了使用该应用程序，需要安装依赖项列表（所有这些都可以使用pip进行安装）。这些可以在这里找到，并使用以下命令 pip install -r requirements.txt ：pip install -r requirements.txt。为了然后运行该工具，使用 python main.py 。

trans-unit.source: In order to integrate directly with the MountainsMapÂ® software, a similar addon application was being worked on. However, this project has been abandoned as a result of limitations with MountainsMapÂ®. The project can be found here.
trans-unit.target: 为了直接与MountainsMap®软件集成，正在开发类似的插件应用程序。但是，由于MountainsMap®的限制，该项目已被放弃。该项目可以在这里找到。

trans-unit.source: More information on how to use the application can be found here.
trans-unit.target: 有关如何使用该应用程序的更多信息，请参见此处。

trans-unit.source: Multiscale regression analysis software, which uses multiscale area data exported from MountainsMap®.
trans-unit.target: 多尺度回归分析软件,使用从MountainsMap®导出的多尺度区域数据。

trans-unit.source: This is a standalone multiscale analysis software developed by Nathaniel Rutkowski. It uses length-scale, area-scale, or area-complexity data exported from MountainsMapÂ®, developed by Digital Surf. The application can then be used to run multiscale regression or discrimination on the exported surface data using F-tests, T-Tests, or ANOVA analysis.
trans-unit.target: 这是Nathaniel Rutkowski开发的独立的多尺度分析软件。它使用从Digital Surf开发的MountainsMap®导出的长度比例尺，面积比例尺或面积复杂度数据。然后可以使用该应用程序使用F检验，T检验或ANOVA分析对导出的曲面数据进行多尺度回归或判别。
